name: Pancake Boi
description:
So you're the new recruit, huh? 

Welcome to Pancake Boi, home of the tastiest and fastest pancakes in the galaxy! As a delivery boi, it's your job to guide your rover on planet-hopping adventures to get fresh stacks of pancakes to our customers in lightspeed time!

Make sure to keep your pancakes balanced while in orbit, and keep an eye out for any floating bottles of syrup. Keep it up, and in no time at all you'll be Pancake Boi's new rising star!

"Pancake Boi" was made as a submission for MST ACM Game Dev's Fall 2022 Game Jam, featuring 100% original assets (art, music, voice acting, etc.) created by our team members (Andrew Gibson, Michael Kovar, Evelyn Jones, and Bradley Marhsall).
